item.description:
Spend quality time with your little one in a stimulating and wholesome setting *Babies & their Moms/Caregivers are welcome to join - Musical Mommy and Me with a Jewish Twist ~ Creative Music and Movement ~ Jewish Songs and Themes~ Sensory Stimulations ~ Free play, Socialize with other Moms in a nurturing environment ~ Snack Provided:
First Timers are always free!
72 for the semester or 10$ a class

group.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist

item.name: Musical Mommy & Me- Last class of winter semester
